Get 50% off

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Regular New Content

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cancel Anytime

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_image=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/KYS_4684-scaled.jpg” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_enable_image_phone=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/KYS_4684-scaled.jpg” alt=”Ami Norton with hands in Namaste in front of blossoms” title_text=”KYS_4684″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ custom_padding=”50px|30px|50px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ header_font=”Josefin Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”25px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

TINT For Students

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ text_font_size=”16px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px|25px|0px|25px|true|true” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]The perfect student offer for all the yogi lovers.

Unlock PREMIUM Yoga content for an AFFORDABLE price with our TINT Student Plan.

Simply click the button below, sign up with your University Email, and request your student discount code. After verification, we will send you your unique student discount code.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ text_font=”|800|||||||” text_font_size=”25px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”24px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”30px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]50% Discount[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ text_font=”|800|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.43)” text_font_size=”20px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”24px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||30px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]Regular Price from $40/Month[/et_pb_text][et_pb_contact_form captcha=”off” email=”namaste@tintyoga.com” custom_message=”Student Offer – discount code request:||et_pb_line_break_holder||||et_pb_line_break_holder||Student-Mail: %%mail%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||||et_pb_line_break_holder||Please check if the student mail looks like it is from a university and send a mail with the discount code using the notion template.” success_message=”Thank you, we will verify your student status and send you the discount code. This may take up to 48 hours.” submit_button_text=”Request your student discount” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ form_field_background_color=”#ffffff” title_font=”||||||||” title_text_color=”#ffffff” custom_margin=”25px||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

*valid for the first 2 years of your subscription.
Email must be from an accredited higher education institution.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”0px||100px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.9″ custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ header_2_font=”Josefin Sans|700||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Student Benefits

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” custom_padding=”40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”18px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Total Flexibility

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”15px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

From the comfort of your own home or out and about. It doesn’t matter where you are. TINT’s got you covered with our Web, TV and Mobile apps.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” custom_padding=”40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”18px” header_2_line_height=”0.8em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Premium Yoga

But Low Price

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Learn from some of the greatest yoga minds in the world and get 50% off our memberships.

From Inside Flow, to Alignment, to Live Classes. There is something for everyone.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” custom_padding=”40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”18px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cancel Anytime

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

No never-ending subscription. Simply cancel whenever you want to. Enjoy quality yoga with no strings attached.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ custom_padding=”100px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.9″ custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ header_2_font=”Josefin Sans|700||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#000″ header_2_font_size=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We answer your questions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#cd7e83″ module_class=”basic-toggle” _builder_version=”4.10.6″ toggle_text_color=”#000000″ toggle_font=”|700|||||||” toggle_font_size=”19px” closed_toggle_font=”|700|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”16px” custom_css_toggle=”padding:30px 0 30px 0;” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_color_bottom=”#f2f2f2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Dummy” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ custom_css_main_element=”display: none” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you are enrolled in a Higher Degree course of any type you are eligible for TINT students

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Am I eligible for TINT students?” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

If you are enrolled in a Higher Degree course of any type you are eligible for TINT students. 

Just sign up with your University Email and request your student discount code. After verification we will send you your unique student discount code.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How do you verify my student status?” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

To verify your student status and make the experience as smooth as possible for you we need you to provide us with your University Email. Simply click the ‘Request Student Code’ button and type in your university email. After, we will verify it and send you a unique Student Code that you can use for our ALL-ACCESS Membership.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What happens when I graduate?” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

After 2 years from the point of verification, your student status will expire and you will automatically switch to a normal ALL-ACCESS Membership for your next payment.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How much will I be charged and when?” _builder_version=”4.10.6″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]The TINT Student Plan offers you a 50% discount for all our membership plans, which you will be charged at your personal start date and based on the plan you’ve chosen.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How long is my Student Membership valid for?” _builder_version=”4.10.6″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]From the moment you start your subscription your student status will be valid for 2 years. After, you will automatically switch to our regular pricing based on your membership.[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_image=”https://tintyoga.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Login-Background.png” custom_padding=”100px||100px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.9″ width=”40%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.9″ header_2_font=”Josefin Sans|700||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”40px” width=”400px” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”auto” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

START YOUR YOGA JOURNEY TODAY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_contact_form captcha=”off” email=”namaste@tintyoga.com” custom_message=”Student Offer – discount code request:||et_pb_line_break_holder||||et_pb_line_break_holder||Student-Mail: %%mail%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||||et_pb_line_break_holder||Please check if the student mail looks like it is from a university and send a mail with the discount code using the notion template.” success_message=”Thank you, we will verify your student status and send you the discount code. This may take up to 48 hours.” submit_button_text=”Request your student discount” module_class=”student-form-black” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ form_field_background_color=”#ffffff” title_font=”||||||||” title_text_color=”#ffffff” captcha_font=”||||||||” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#de3d5e” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_use_icon=”off” button_custom_padding=”15px||15px||true|false” animation_direction=”right” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”15px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_contact_field field_id=”mail” field_title=”Your student mail address” field_type=”email” fullwidth_field=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.9″ form_field_background_color=”#ffffff” form_field_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”left” min_height=”64px” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” form_field_background_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” form_field_background_color__hover=”#efefef”][/et_pb_contact_field][/et_pb_contact_form][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

After verification, we will send you your unique […]

@graph.description: TINT Yoga offers premium online yoga classes with the world's most popular yoga and movement instructors. Learn and work out with our online yoga videos.
